column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I was a little underwhelmed. I had high expectations for Jinya and they did fall short of those expectations. Overall
column3: but I wouldn't say it was exceptional. I would have hoped that if I were to order a product off the menu with the restaurant name in the title
column4: I would be getting something that would be considered a staple of the establishment. Something that when you eat it
column6: this is delicious and I get it
column8: I did not find that to be the case for the Jinya Tonkostu Black.
